data.title: Magazine Scams
data.meta_description: Beware of magazine scams that use high-pressure sales tactics and make false claims. These types of scams often take on the following forms. Fake Invoices Sent Through the Mail Companies will send magazine subscription offers that look like renewal notices or bills. They will use words like “publisher,” “billing,” or “service” in their names and purposefully make their letters
